kenticocommunity.qandaanswerdata.QAndAAnswerDataContent:
I'm not sure what is causing your error.
This is [the same implementation](https://github.com/Kentico/community-portal/blob/v30.4.1.3/src/Kentico.Community.Portal.Web/Features/SEO/SitemapRetriever.cs#L58) I use in the Kentico Community Portal, [which works](https://community.kentico.com/sitemap.xml).
```CSharp var b = new ContentItemQueryBuilder() .ForContentTypes(c => c .OfReusableSchema(IWebPageMeta.REUSABLE_FIELD_SCHEMA_NAME) .ForWebsite(website.WebsiteChannelName)) .InLanguage(PortalWebSiteChannel.DEFAULT_LANGUAGE); ```
Possible causes of your problem.
1. You are querying a different database than the one you are using the generate your content types. 2. You have a build error so your code generation isn't actually running or your generated code is out of date compared to what is in the database. 3. Your use of the `IContentQueryExecutor` is causing the problem, not the query you've constructed.
